title: Weekly Mental Health Discussion Thread
selftext:
Is there anything that you want to get off your chest? Heartbreak, abuse, depression, sorrow, career or education related, behavioural changes? Share it and discuss it here.

You may find someone who has gone through a similar episode and might be able to help/guide you.

Please be civil and maintain Reddiquette while participating or replying/helping out someone.

You can also join our [Discord](https://discord.gg/6V29X7f) to discuss this, we have a separate channel (#wellness) exclusively for this topic.

**If you need support or know someone who does, please Reach Out to Your Nearest Mental Health Specialist**.

* **Helplines**: AASRA: 91-22-27546669 (24 hours)
* **Sneha Foundation**: 91-44-24640050 (24 hours)
* **Vandrevala Foundation for Mental Health**: 1860-2662-345 and 1800-2333-330 (24 hours)
* **iCall**: 9152987821 (Available from Monday to Saturday: 8:00am to 10:00pm)
* **Connecting NGO**: 18002094353 (Available from 12 pm - 8 pm)

**Mental Health Thread is posted every Wednesday morning |** [**Old Threads**](https://www.reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Mental+Discussion&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/1fqd80djw8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=184ead1efd5057f53cc3236ab564a2ce3ac8a7f6
comments:
Really disappointed with my company. 

I joined as a graphic design intern for 10k pm; their offer for full-time was 25k pm. 

I was a professional photographer earlier so they also utilised my skills to do a corporate video shoot as well as edit it. 

I've made graphic design social media posts, shot these videos professionally and edited them as well, made some motion graphics storyboard changes, and some other inhouse works. 

All this was in my intern time and this month they said they're making me full time. 

The issue is, the offer from their side is 15k. Which is very  disrespectful.

I moved out of my house and live alone and have pushed myself totally in these 3 months. I survived on 10k without any issue because I was looking forward to becoming full time. Their offer really surprised me. Who increases 5k and says it's full-time?

And this underpay is very common in many of these art firms. 
They try to undermine you, make you work more but pay less. 

Terms like, "we're a team", "I'm providing you a system". Is all bs. 


Luckily I've an offer from another company, which is paying me 30k minimum for only graphic design works. 

I'm really shifting to that place or will find other places rather than staying here for the underpay and being undermined subtly. 

What do you guys think? Let me know.
Why would you stay at half the salary? Switch it mate. They are playing you.
Switch it bro, best of luck.
That's what I'm thinking bro, thank you ðŸ™Œ
Actually yeah, I'm gonna do that
